message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and high-quality materials. Given its exceptional value, I propose a price of $100 for it. I believe this is a fair deal considering the benefits it offers. Please let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I believe it's a bit steep at $100, but I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product. Can we meet in the middle at $80?
